name: places/ChIJg_d0fORYwokRwrbFFIrx3W8
adrFormatAddress: 909 3rd Ave #1300, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
I don’t usually write reviews, however, I am compelled to share my experience with Attorney Robin Gray. I have been facing ongoing difficult divorce litigation due to the questionable morals of the opposing attorney. I had to terminate several prior attorneys because none of them could stand up to opposing counsel and defend me.

Fortunately I found attorney Gray, and she agreed to represent me. After my previously unbelievably painful experiences, I met a true professional, true fighter for justice, ethical but boy oh so tough!

Attorney Gray is very accessible, responsive and literally devoted to her clients.

It feels to me like the world of this litigation nightmare suddenly has a light at the end.
